title: Blenn Bean
text:
Blenn Bean (born February 13, 1977) is a retired <a href="Bermuda">Bermudian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
Bean began his career with <a href="PHC%20Zebras">PHC Zebras</a>, and played for the team for five years in the <a href="Bermudian%20Premier%20Division">Bermudian Premier Division</a> before joining the <a href="Bermuda%20Hogges">Bermuda Hogges</a> in the <a href="USL%20Second%20Division">USL Second Division</a> in 2008.
International career.
He made his debut for <a href="Bermuda%20national%20football%20team">Bermuda</a> in a January 2000 <a href="friendly%20match">friendly match</a> against <a href="Canada%20men%27s%20national%20soccer%20team">Canada</a> and earned a total of 12 caps, scoring no goals.
His final international match was a January 2007 <a href="CONCACAF%20Gold%20Cup">CONCACAF Gold Cup</a> qualification match against <a href="Haiti%20national%20football%20team">Haiti</a>.
